<<<<<<< HEAD
The antiquity and power of parliaments in England written by Mr. Justice Doddridge and several other learned antiquaries. Doddridge, John, Sir, 1555-1628.
46, 96, [2] p.
Printed for William Leake and John Leake ..., London : 1679.
Signed on pages 73, 85, 90, respectively: Francis Tate, William Camden, Joseph Holland. Published as the work of Doddridge by his nephew John Doddridge of the Middle Temple. It is of doubtful authenticity. Cf. DNB. Advertisement: [2] p. at end. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Marginal notes.
=======

46, 96, [2] p.
Printed for William Leake and John Leake ..., London : 1679.
Signed on pages 73, 85, 90, respectively: Francis Tate, William Camden, Joseph Holland. Published as the work of Doddridge by his nephew John Doddridge of the Middle Temple. It is of doubtful authenticity. Cf. DNB. Advertisement: [2] p. at end. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. Marginal notes.
John Leake
